text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the Lenovo Legion Y530 81FV0001US Gaming Notebooks, 15.6" FHD IPS, Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, 8 GB DDR4 2666 MHz Memory, 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home 64-Bit is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the screen brightness on the Lenovo Legion Y530 81FV0001US Gaming Notebooks, 15.6" FHD IPS, Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, 8 GB DDR4 2666 MHz Memory, 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home 64-Bit. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Elden Ring. The build quality of the Lenovo Legion Y530 81FV0001US Gaming Notebooks, 15.6" FHD IPS, Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, 8 GB DDR4 2666 MHz Memory, 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home 64-Bit is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Lenovo Legion Y530 81FV0001US Gaming Notebooks, 15.6" FHD IPS, Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, 8 GB DDR4 2666 MHz Memory, 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home 64-Bit!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the Lenovo Legion Y530 81FV0001US Gaming Notebooks, 15.6" FHD IPS, Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, 8 GB DDR4 2666 MHz Memory, 1 TB HDD, Windows 10 Home 64-Bit is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
